# we-checkbox-group

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                         | Type  | Default     |
| ------------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| `changeCallback`    | `change-callback` | Event triggered when a checkbox inside change its state that returning the name of checkbox group and the value of checkbox changed | `any` | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`            | Name that identify this checkbox group                                                                                              | `any` | `undefined` |
